function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large uncertainty in transmission reductions during relaxation phases","Impact":"Inability to accurately predict the effectiveness of NPIs and the resulting transmission rates","Mitigation":"Increase data collection and analysis to reduce uncertainty and improve prediction accuracy","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling and simulation tools","People":"Public health experts, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Heterogeneity in transmission reduction among regions","Impact":"Unequal impact of NPIs on different regions, leading to uneven disease transmission rates","Mitigation":"Tailor NPI strategies to the specific needs and characteristics of each region","Technologies":"Geospatial analytics, dynamic modeling, and simulation tools","People":"Local health authorities and policymakers","Owner":"Local health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Temporal changes in the effective reproduction number (R eff) due to varying NPI effectiveness","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing the continuous impact of NPIs on disease transmission over time","Mitigation":"Monitor R eff trends continuously and adjust NPI strategies accordingly","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring systems, data analytics, and predictive modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, and data analysts","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
